mapper.select: select tb.ID FROM b_taskbill tb LEFT JOIN MDM_DATALIBRAY mdm ON tb.id = mdm.task LEFT JOIN b_datainterface face ON face.code = mdm.code join B_DATARULE rul ON rul.id = tb.MODELID join L_RULEVIEW lrv ON lrv.DATARULE = rul.ID join b_dataview vw ON vw.id = lrv.DATAVIEW and vw.type = 0 WHERE tb.status = 9 and vw.master in(8,7,3)

select DISTINCT b_coderule.id FROM l_billencoder join l_ruleview ON l_billencoder.dataview=l_ruleview.dataview join b_taskbill ON b_taskbill.modelid=l_ruleview.datarule join b_coderule ON l_billencoder.coderule=b_coderule.id WHERE b_taskbill.id=#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete FROM b_propcode WHERE cr=#{cr} and code in (select code FROM MDM_DATALIBRAY WHERE task=#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
delete FROM L_DATALIBRAY2TASK WHERE F_DATALIBRAY in(select id FROM MDM_DATALIBRAY WHERE task= #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
delete FROM MDM_PROPTYPE WHERE mdl in(select id FROM MDM_DATALIBRAY WHERE task=#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
delete FROM MDM_VIEWCODE WHERE mdl in(select id FROM MDM_DATALIBRAY WHERE task=#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
